TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 識別不屬於應用程式之使用者程式碼的類型或成員。

span.span: Identifies a type or member that is not part of the user code for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所提供的設計工具並不屬於使用者特別建立的程式碼的類型和成員可以使得偵錯經驗。Designer provided types and members that are not part of the code specifically created by the user can complicate the debugging experience. 這個屬性隱藏這些附屬的類型和成員的偵錯工具視窗和自動步驟透過，而不到所提供的程式碼設計工具中顯示。This attribute suppresses the display of these adjunct types and members in the debugger window and automatically steps through, rather than into, designer provided code. 在逐步執行使用者程式碼時，偵錯工具遇到這個屬性，使用者經驗時，不會看到所提供的程式碼設計工具並逐步執行至下一個使用者提供的程式碼陳述式。When the debugger encounters this attribute when stepping through user code, the user experience is to not see the designer provided code and to step to the next user-supplied code statement. > [!NOTE] > Common language runtime 會將任何語意附加至這個屬性。The common language runtime attaches no semantics to this attribute. 這是由來源的程式碼偵錯工具提供使用。It is provided for use by source code debuggers. 例如，在[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，偵錯工具不會在偵錯工具視窗中顯示具有此屬性的項目，不會停止在方法中利用此屬性，且不允許在方法中設定中斷點。For example, in [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], the debugger does not display an element with this attribute in the debugger window, does not stop in a method with this attribute, and does not allow a breakpoint to be set in the method. 偵錯工具行為時存在於類似於使用的組合屬性，會隱藏的偵錯工具中的程式碼，而屬性會告知偵錯工具逐步執行，而不是為，它會套用至程式碼。The debugger behavior when the is present is similar to using a combination of the attribute, which hides the code from the debugger, and the attribute, which tells the debugger to step through, rather than into, the code it is applied to. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示在 Visual Basic 專案中使用這個屬性。The following code example shows the use of this attribute in a Visual Basic project. ```vb ' Form overrides Dispose to clean up the component list. _ Protected Overloads Overrides Sub Dispose(ByVal disposing As Boolean) If disposing AndAlso components IsNot Nothing Then components.Dispose() End If MyBase.Dispose(disposing) End Sub ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需這個建構函式和及其使用範例的函式的說明，請參閱類別。For a description of the function of this constructor and an example of its use, see the class.
